title: Got in Low Priority Queue for No Reason :/
body:
Um, I just got put in to Low Priority Queue after updating to 5.1. The last time I afked was when I was in a custom with my bros and I needed to go eat dinner. The one before that was 3 days ago, when I had to go eat dinner. I still came back tho, and we actually still won that game. (LB carry op) I played about 5 games in between these games, without any actions of afk. 

So, is there like a delay in which I get in Low Priority Queue? I'm just curious. 

P.S.- If and only if a rioter sees this, can I send you a ticket so that I can see what I did wrong?

Thanks, 
Silver II nub nub who mis-typed his summoner name,
FootballOsyssey

replies.body: Hey everyone, and sorry for the late response. This Riot announcement will help you understand what happened with your queue status today: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bZEhN2LB-delayed-leaverbuster-penalties
some here, waiting for 10 minutes right now...... RIOT PLZ FIX
Left a game cause the attempting to reconnect thing doesnt actually reconnect you. :| 20 minute wait times
I saw a rioter mention that these are low priority queues that were delayed from the holiday season craziness and are all being served late
Oooh, that sucks... But, was it our fault? If not, why are we suffering the consequences blindly?

Same thing just happened to me. Haven't afked or left a game in weeks since my last low priority queue. It should only last your first game though, at least mine only did. Must be some sort of glitch on Riot's end.
